metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1215 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A format string vulnerability was found in libinput

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-1215` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libinput-bin - 1.10.4-1ubuntu0.18.04.3
libinput-tools - 1.10.4-1ubuntu0.18.04.3
libinput10 - 1.10.4-1ubuntu0.18.04.3
No subscription required

notes.Note: alexmurray> According to the upstream notification, this vulnerability only affects libinput since 1.10 and so may not affect libinput in xenial.

criterions.comment: libinput package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.10.4-1ubuntu0.18.04.3').
